description: Delete a project phase cost item actual.
permissions: Allowed for admins. Non-admins are allowed if they can update the related project phase cost item, or if they are a manager member of the job production plan customer, a manager laborer, a laborer who can manage projects, or the job production plan planner/project manager.
side_effects: Deletes the project phase cost item actual record; after commit it triggers job production plan recap generation and touches the project actual estimate set.
validation_notes: Requires --confirm. Deletion is blocked when the record is associated with a cost code allocation.
